name: Mini Gray Tigris Cub
description:
This furry companion may seem cute now, but one day it will grow into a fearsome predator.
Combine a Gray Tigris Cub and 2 Orange Tigris Cubs with 2 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini White Tigris Cub.
Combine 3 Gray Tigris Cubs with 5 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Pink Tigris Cub.
